about_the_game:
As an entry level Food Consulting and Delivery Engineer Customer Specialist, you’ll be tasked with ensuring our customers get the absolute best service. The Burger Flipper brand is in your hands!




Your responsibilities include (but are not limited to):
  • Work the full shift, open to close
  • Prepare our most popular meals in advance and on downtime to help with morning and afternoon rushes
  • Ensure timely preparation of each customer's orders to guarantee high ratings and reviews
  • CUSTOMER FACING ROLE! Serve customers at the counter, taking orders and returning correct change. MUST BE COMFORTABLE HANDLING MONEY!
  • Cook entrees and sides for orders
  • Work collaboratively with new hires, coordinating tasks between the counter, kitchen, and cleaning crews
  • Adapt to the situation, think on your feet, and handle any unexpected issues that may arise




We pay minimum wage, but there's ample room for growth. Work hard and get rewarded. We promote from within! You can become the next store manager and decide who we hire, who works what shift, what new equipment to buy, what services we offer, and menu prices!

Our most successful managers can discuss franchise opportunities.




Entry level cook, cashier, and server


  • 1 year in any role within the food industry
  • Fast learner
  • Ability to multi-task


  • 5 years working at Burger Flipper
  • 2 years managing entry level cooks, cashiers, and servers
  • At least one other "Simulator" title in your Steam library


We've partnered with the following third-party subscription services to help make your job at Burger Flipper easier. Please validate our monthly costs by using these services as much as possible during the work day!



  • Stock Mart, the best deals on restaurant equipment and solutions. From ovens and packaging to point-of-sales and fryers
  • Fresh, where we purchase the highest quality (and cheapest) ingredients that give our meals that signature flavor and addicting levels of sodium that keeps customers coming back for more
  • Taste, the #1 restaurant reviews site. Monitor your performance by tracking how much customers enjoyed their experiences. Happy customers come back -- with friends!
  • Cash Flow, a top finance and accounting app. Keep the numbers above the bottom line on the graph to make sure you stay in business
  • Jobly, find the best candidates that are willing to work for minimum wage all in one convenient job portal. Candidates must submit resumes, but the site just uses it to filter out those who don't. We never see the resumes. That alone is worth the subscription.


Burger Flipper will be founded sometime in… 2025. At Burger Flipper, every meal is a chance to flip a frown into a smile.

Thank you for applying! Once a position opens up for one of our soft-launches, we’ll be in touch!



Wishlist us your resume so we can get in touch for the grand Burger Flipper opening in 2025!

Have a Flippin’ Day!

short_description: Welcome to the Burger Flipper team! As our first hire, you’ll put a smile on customers’ faces as you prepare and serve their orders... And clean the kitchen and stock inventory. But we promote within! One day, you’ll be the manager, hiring new flippers, purchasing equipment, and choosing the menu!
